headline: SHW Q1 Earnings Call: Resilient Margins Amid Soft Revenue and Choppy Demand
summary: Paint and coating manufacturer Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 1.1% year on year to $5.31 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.25 per share was 4.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
